Submodules¶

hyperaggregate.server.privacy_preserving_server module¶

class hyperaggregate.server.privacy_preserving_server.SchedulingServer(port, target_size, group_size, num_actors, aggregation_profile, debug_mode=False)¶

Bases: hyperaggregate.shared.responsive_message_router.ResponsiveMessageRouter

Implementation of helper server

Variables

  • port – Port on which the server should run on

  • target_size – Required number of clients to sign up for aggregation before it starts

  • group_size – Preferable size of aggregation groups in aggregation tree

  • num_actors – Number of aggregation actors in each group of aggregation tree

  • aggregation_profile – Aggregation and message transport logic in form of AggregationProfile instance

  • debug_mode – Indicator whether to use verbose logging suitable for debugging

register_callbacks()¶

Method that should return a dictionary of message types as keys associated with their coresponding callbacks as values

Return type

dict(MessageType, (str, object) => ())

Module contents¶

Helper server
